description: An LSD file may be a system dictionary supplied with Lingvo Dictionary or created by users. It supports different types of formatting and layout options such as comments, bold and italic fonts, and usage examples.

You can create an LSD file from a DSL file. First create a .TXT file, add your content, and then rename the file extension to ".dsl." You can then use the DSL Compiler, which is included with Lingvo Dictionary, to compile the DSL file into an LSD file.
